teal.framework

Interface TFramework

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, TAbstractFramework, TElementManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimPlayer, TealBasicApp, TealDefaultApp, TealSimApp

    public interface TFramework
extends TAbstractFramework, java.awt.event.ActionListener, TElementManager
    The framework interface for all TEAL top level applications.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.30 $
    Author:
    mesrob, Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger
